name: Buried Deep
description:
There are miners Trapped in the mountains, and they need you to dig them out. 

This game creates a randomly generated mountain, with miners hidden in different places every time. 

Press G to fire the drill

Press Space to activate the jet pack. 

Due to side effects from the Covid-19 vaccine, I am calling this done here. 

The combat system was never developed and there are no sound effects, But i learned what I hoped about the Unity TileMap system

Tools Unity
